name: sadr
description: A Chrome extension for Deneb, it enhances some ability for social

scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production BROWSER_TYPE=Chrome webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build:prod:firefox: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production BROWSER_TYPE=Firefox webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run build:dev
scripts.start:firefox: npm run clean && npm run build:dev:firefox
